p: The dietary supplementation with antioxidant extract (synthetic VitE; natural VitE; flavonoid extract-enriched diet (Flav); and phenolic compound-enriched diet (Phen)) [ 23] did not affect the fatty acid composition but had an impact on lipid oxidation of pigs LD. More specifically, the TBARS values in Phen- and Flav-fed animals were higher than in the other groups and only similar to those consuming the basal diet [ 29] ( Table 1).
